name: epic roller coasters
summary: In Epic Roller Coasters you'll get the same feeling of a real roller coaster with a high level graphics, physics-based simulation. You'll go up and down seeing everything around you with our long range vision capabilities!
info:
• 平台: PC、Oculus、Android
  • 游戏类型: VR 休闲 竞速
  • 开发商: B4T Games
  • 发行: B4T Games
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2018年3月7日
  • 售价: 免费
